name: Eboni Brazil
text: Pizza is good but I found a piece of hair in mine today.

name: Craig Clawson
text: Blaze has good pizza for good prices. The employees are all very nice too. Highly recommend it.

name: Jan Galbreath
text: Love the concept! And the cauliflower crust was amazing!

name: K8 AtTheMall
text: Love it!  I've had disappointing margherita pizza experiences since I moved out to the burbs, this is the first good one Ive had in two years!  Will be returning!

name: T J
text: Easy online order. Reasonable price for the pizza. Pizza done within the quoted pick up time. Friendly staff with curbside delivery. Lots of parking. I was excited to find a place that had a keto friendly menu item. Unfortunately, my taste ‚Ä¶More

name: Heather Jost
text: Fast Personalized service (even though was Extremely Busy!!!) Food was fantastic and was made to my Order(I LOVE THAT!) Employees are also Fantastic!!!!! Nicely decorated,  Great for groups or even for solo eating! I highly reccomend to ANY PIZZA LOVER!ü§ó Will be going back very Soon!

name: Wind Storm
text: Tried not to rate this place this low for our pure love of Blazes food and I‚Äôve eaten here (take out) 3 times with multiple and various pizza‚Äôs each time.  They burned the crust each time on all 4 pizzas, even after I asked them to undercook a little. Very sparse pizza toppings compared to other places.   Not worthy of the cost.

name: David Cheung
text: Fully customizable pizzas featuring all kinds of meat and vegetables. You can also just pick a signature pizza if you do not feel like making decisions that day. Their salads looked pretty solid as well. Definitely try their agua fresca drinks.

name: Michael Oster
text: Super fast, good food, good options to get around food allergies

name: Brian Borres
text: Great pizza great service. Very clean with plenty of PPE.

name: Javier Garcia
text: I went yesterday to this place and ate a pizza. Now I have stomach flu and almost taking off to the hospital. What a bad experience

name: D Patterson
text: Clean restaurant super nice staff

name: Bill Harker
text: New pizza place at the Block. Great simple margherita pizza. Lots of different options if you‚Äôre looking to customize your pizza too. Order on the app to skip the long lines.

name: Kim PossABLE
text: If you haven't been to this place yet, you are missing out! GREAT pizza! GREAT prices! and GREATER customer service!!! We can't stay away!

name: Ken Kubala
text:
Thin but not crispy which it should be for how thin it is. Maybe 2 slices of pepperoni per slice. About the size of a medium, 10"
Good selection of cheese, toppings and dough.
Try it once and see if you think it is worth the price.

name: Glenn Eggert
text: This is actually great quick pizza and not expensive at all either. You can get in there and get served in no time or usually that's mostly the case. ‚Ä¶More

name: H
text: The pizza was great! Not greasy! It was made to my liking, the atmosphere was clean. There was outside seating. The application did not work for ordering.

name: Joette Smida
text: I was told that I had to place an order online to get the coupon deal when I called Blaze pizza. I attempted to place the order online and entered the code. I was told the code didn‚Äôt work for my entry of a large pizza, which is the what ‚Ä¶More

name: Chris Ober
text: I love this Blaze Pizza. Eaten here many times now since it opened. Always quick service and the pick up option on the app is AMAZING. ‚Ä¶More

name: Brad Divins
text: Always love vegan options. The workers are very helpful with accomodations as well.

name: Hannah Hitchens
text: friendly staff, good pizza

name: Patricia Walters
text: What a great pizza shop. Not only was the pizza very good, the staff was great. The owner/franchise should be proud. Well worth trying.

name: Dan Lebak
text: The worst !!! You have free pizza but on line and that system was not user friendly. We got 2 pizzas it took 45 minutes for the first pizza , to find out it was wrong then the second pizza took 1.10 minutes they gave that pizza to someone ‚Ä¶More

name: Rachael Mazzoni
text: So so good. I've tried cauliflower crusts and keto crusts as I'm gluten I tolerant. The best around! Love that you can get unlimited toppings with the specialty pizza orders

name: Jared Sheatz
text: Great product, friendly staff, and fairly priced. Much better than V3.  Not stingy.

name: M Robinson
text: Great pizza mixed with the efficiency of fast-food service equals Blaze Pizza.  Build your own pie or choose from their line-up of several house-made favorites; you just can't go wrong.  Blaze's pizza is thin and delicious.  So thin, in ‚Ä¶More

name: Kimberly Aretz
text: Blaze Pizza is not my favorite of all pizza places, but  I really like the fire oven taste and the fast bake time. You order it specifically to your food preferences like you would in a sub restaurant. It's always nice to see your fast food ‚Ä¶More

name: Cameron Stewart
text: Consistently good food, incredibly accommodating for my food allergies, bringing out a new spoon container of sauce. The power also went out as we were eating and all the employees were calm and quick  acting to help the folks still in line

name: Nigel Yin
text: Really fast,  friendly,  and tasty!

name: Andrew Brown
text: People were very nice, but food sucked. Pizza was slimy and undercooked. Garlic knots tasted like raw preservative filled balls of thick pasty dough that were hard in the center. The lady was nice enough to cook it twice as long...but the ‚Ä¶More

name: David Issod
text: Undercooked, missing ingredients, and ‚Äúsoupy‚Äù- Ordered at 615pm, said it would be available by 715pm but ended up waiting an additional 40 minutes for this inedible mess! Now I am throwing it away and need to find something else for dinner.

name: Frank C3
text: Nice place with good food. Friendly staff

name: shawn zugai
text:
Good pie, bad service.
Gave one of our pies away to another customer so they had to remake it. Also forget to make my salad. Not a well managed operation.

name: Levi William
text: Love their pizza! Always fresh and tasty. The workers are all very nice too. One of my new favorite spots.

name: Ian Davis
text: Went tonight to support the NH boys lacrosse foundation where this nice pizza shop helped donate 20% of their profits from my purchase to the foundation. The pizza is super delicious and ingredients are fresh. The pizza was done quickly and every employee was super kind. Thanks guys!

name: Mike Kowalski
text: Pizza is good.  Being able to make a different pizza each time you go there is cool.

name: Jody Steinberger
text: Concept of Blaze is really simple.  Pick a crust, pick your favorite foods, wait three minutes...BAM your brick oven fired pizza is ready.  Execution of this concept has never been anything but excellent..GET THE BLOOD RED ORANGE DRINK!!!!

name: Ramakrishna Bollineni
text: Great Pizza place !!

name: Suzy Selinger
text: Pizza is AWESOME.

name: Sunil
text: Wow. $8.25 and you build your own with whatever toppings you like. The fire oven is quick and the dough fresh made with great sauce and toppings. I can only eat half, usually take the rest home in the special box they have. What a great concept, it is like a Chipotle and Subway style concept üòÉ

name: Griffin Ernyei
text: Best pizza I've had since by trip to New York City. 11/10 would recommend!

name: The Parlor Mob The Parlor Mob
text: Marvelous pizza and salads! Service is exceptional. Just give it a try.

name: Charise Wall
text: 1st time there they explained everything and the food awesome

text: Fast and customizable puzzas. Not the best but decent enough and some pizzas are under 800 calories. Not for pizza connoisseurs though.

text: Great service, tons of good choices for toppings! Tried it out because I drove by and saw the sign that it was now open and would definitely go back.

text:
Bbq chicken pizza was delicious.   Staff was friendly
Will definitely be back

This is another restaurant with a learning curve.

name: Jessica Forest
text: The mall itself is very confusing so I was parked on the side where aldis is and used the map to decipher where blaze was.  For others looking, it is on the lower level right behind the Tesla charging station.  My first experience with them ‚Ä¶More
